author: abdoulline
body:
#### PR description:

Additional 4 HB/HE/HO/HF rechits energy spectra with noise cleaning applied.
To explicitly assess the effect of cleaning.    

#### PR validation:

runTheMatris is OK in 11_0_0_pre5

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

no backport is needed
title: HCAL DQMOffline: adding rechits spectra with enabled cleaning
